attributes.action: no betrayal of the gurkhas and iraqi interpreters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: your government is guilty of the most shameful betrayal of the gurkhas and iraqi interpreters---the whole world knows only too well of this dreadful treatment of the most loyal friends of britain---please rectify

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
